name: Where Are You
description:
You wake up in a strange room.

You feel terribly stale air. 

You don't know where you got the flashlight, and you don't know if you're here alone. But one thing you know for sure, you have to escape as soon as possible from this weird place.

This is a really early (and short) demo, it would help me a lot if you wrote your opinions in the comments. And maybe check it out some time later for new updates! :)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Thanks for the support!
